text: The Longest Night () is a 2019 Ecuadorian drama film directed by Gabriela Calvache. It was selected as the Ecuadorian entry for the Best International Feature Film at the 92nd Academy Awards, but it was not nominated. ==Plot== A prostitute exploited by a mafia boss tries to break free and pursue justice. ==Cast== * Noëlle Schönwald as Dana * Cristian Mercado as Julián * Jaime Tamariz as Nelson ==See also== * List of submissions to the 92nd Academy Awards for Best International Feature Film * List of Ecuadorian submissions for the Academy Award for Best International Feature Film ==References== ==External links== * Category:2019 films Category:2019 drama films Category:Ecuadorian films Category:Ecuadorian drama films Category:Spanish- language films
title: The Longest Night (2019 film)
